about.text: Hello! My name is Miguel Nava, software developer, passionate about software development and technology, I am currently studying Computer Systems Engineering and I am about to finish this wonderful profession. Without realizing it, I opened my career towards technology where I have always bet and given everything, I went through experiences that really added value to my professional training. Now I'm about to finish college and it has been a great journey. And as expected, this does not end here, there is still much to learn and many challenges to meet. This is the beginning of a new adventure in the incredible world of technology!
